item.title: Consulting Services
item.description: Consulting Services Findop Solutions LLC provides technical consulting services on Prototyping control, optimization, and machine learningfor various applications Review existing control system architecture and algorithms design Training on Simulink/Simscape modeling and model-based-design Literature review / patent research on autonomous driving and robotics related inventions

item.title: Happy New Year!
item.description: (Watching Boston 2022 First Night Fireworks across Charles River)

item.title: About
item.description: About me Findop Solutions LLC is a technical consulting company founded in early 2020 by me, Yu Jiang. I hold a PhD degree in Electrical Engineering (minored in Mathematics) from the New York University (NYU), and I am specialized in formulating and solving optimization and control problems in autonomous driving and robotics in general. I am based in the Greater Boston Area, MA. See My Homepage for more details about me.

item.title: Camera Calibration Using MATLAB
item.description: Today, I started to play around the camera calibration app in MATLAB Autonomous Driving System Toolbox to calibrate the intrinsic parameters. The app applis the Zhang’s method (checker board method) to quickly calibrate the parameters we need. See MathWorks Documentation for more details I used this link to generate the checker board, and have it printed at Fedex.

item.title: A jumping simulink integrator (narrated in Chinese)
item.description: This is a video (narriated in Chinese) regarding how to create a simulink block that jumps around when the model is running/simulating. This was originally post on 知乎 (zhihu.com) by myself.

item.title: Simulink Model Api
item.description: This is a video (narriated in Chinese) introducing how to make use of Simulink model API. This was originally post on 知乎 (zhihu.com) by myself.
